name: Chocolate Cake
description: No bells and whistles here—just a good ol’ chocolate cake. Well, there is one, sweet surprise: it's gluten free! This cake is so moist, rich, and smooth, you’d never guess. Crafted to perfection with top-tier ingredients like organic cocoa powder and cane sugar, it can be whipped up in a flash for any sweet treat emergency (our favourite kind of emergency).
preparation: In a large bowl, with an electric mixer, beat cake mix with egg, milk, oil, and vanilla for 2 min on medium. Gently stir in boiling water until smooth (batter will be thin).
Pour into lightly oiled 8" round silicone cake pan.

Microwave, uncovered, on high 5–7 min, or until center is almost set. Rest in pan for 6 min; invert onto Cooling Rack to cool. Or, bake in preheated 350° F oven for 30–35 min, or until a toothpick inserted in centre of cake comes out clean. Cool 10 min before unmolding.
Let cool completely before icing, if desired.
tips: Microwave cooking time may vary based on microwave wattage. Baked goods cooked in the microwave taste best when eaten the same day.
Use unsweetened nut or soy milk or 2% milk.

products.name: Chocolate Cake Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Oh, baby! This is the stuff: Moist, fluffy, gluten free chocolate cake that’s unbelievably decadent. Elevate birthday parties, Friday date nights, weekend dinners with a cake that everyone will ask you to bake over and over again – for real, it’s that good! Best of all? It’s ready in less than 10 mins in the microwave.

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
